QuestData.Title: The Nether Approaches
QuestData.Description: By connecting with the Twisting Nether, the Warsong shaman have created a ripple effect that they could not have anticipated.$b$bLook around and you will see countless portals beginning to open, signs that the Twisting Nether seeks to connect to Draenor.$b$bShould these portals successfully open, the path will be clear for all manner of demons and void creatures to rampage across this valley.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.CompletionText: Should the portals open and connect the Twisting Nether to Draenor, the path will be clear for the armies of the void to march upon our world!
QuestData.RewardText: If those portals were to fully expand and open, the path would have been clear for the horrors of the Twisting Nether to march upon Nagrand.$b$bThe Warsong have been careless in their mad pursuit of power and glory.
